I am only assuming this is the correct location for such a question. I would like to start recording my space adventures and am wondering the best (or easiest) ways of capturing the memorable excitement. I am familiar with FRAPS, although continually frustrated with its limitations. Also easy to use video editing software recommendations are welcome.

I am also sure there may be other posts regarding this issue out there and for the record I did search but I kept receiving errors.

you would need to state what limitations you are refering to, if you are for example counting 'not being able to add webcam head shot in corner' as a limitation, then the problem is you want web broadcasting software and you are using video recording software.
